value:
$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|Come now, Brother! Join me
for another dance!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|Lachesis... You have danced
as my partner most of the night.
Why not join someone else?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|I would rather not! I will continue
dancing with my brother, if it is all
the same to you.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|Look around. Do you not see the
flame of envy flaring in the eyes
of all the gentlemen here?$k$pThey want to dance with you...
And have been waiting ever so
patiently for the chance.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|I should dance with someone
ignorant of the lineage of Nordion's
royal princess? I think not!$k$pAnd it would be insensitive of me
to disturb Lord Sigurd and Deirdre
in the midst of their affection.$k$pAs with Quan and Ethlyn as well...
Alas, dear brother, there truly is no
one to dance with outside of you.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|...I suppose I have no choice then.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|Oh, I am so glad! The next song has
already begun. Shall we?$k$p

$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|...Brother? Something on your mind?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|Never mind me.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|If you refuse to tell me, I am forced
to guess! Could it have something to
do with my sister-in-law, perhaps?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|...Yes. She has been through too
much, and because of me.$k$pIf I am to dance and feast here,
I ought to consider the hardship
I have caused her.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|Even alone with me, his mind is ever
somewhere else, with someONE else.
I can never have him all to mysel—$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|...What was that, Lachesis?$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|Hm? Oh, I was just thinking aloud!
...When we return home, we ought
to throw a ball just like this one.$k$pEveryone could don their best attire,
and we could all dance together...$k$pI imagine that would make dear
sister-in-law quite happy.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|A marvelous idea. Thank you,
Lachesis. I appreciate your
insight here.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|Think nothing of it! Your happiness
is my happiness, Brother.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|Lachesis... You are the most caring
sister anyone could hope to have.
I am happy to call you my sister.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|Hee hee...$k$p
